DOC.brief_summary: To investigate the pharmacokinetic and pharmacodynamic interaction of dabigatran and ticagrelor under steady state conditions; to investigate the effect of staggered administration of ticagrelor loading dose on dabigatran exposure (in Part II)
DOC.brief_title: Investigation of Drug-drug Interaction of Dabigatran and Ticagrelor
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: 1. Healthy male subjects. Exclusion criteria: 1. Any relevant deviation from healthy conditions.
